title: Chelsea Clinton comes to Barron Trumpâ€™s defense: Let him â€˜be a kidâ€™
text:
Tweet 
Former first daughter Chelsea Clinton came to Barron Trumpâ€™s defense on Sunday after he was mocked by some social media users following his fatherâ€™s inauguration. 
â€œBarron Trump deserves the chance every child does â€” to be a kid,â€ Clinton, the daughter of former President Bill Clinton and former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton, wrote on Twitter. 
The daughter of President Donald Trumpâ€™s former rival also criticized the president in the tweet, adding that, â€œStanding up for every kid also means opposing [Trumpâ€™s] policies that hurt kids.â€ Barron Trump deserves the chance every child does-to be a kid. Standing up for every kid also means opposing @POTUS policies that hurt kids. 
â€” Chelsea Clinton (@ChelseaClinton) January 22, 2017 
Katie Rich, a writer for Saturday Night Live, recently made headlines for tweeting that the 10-year-old will become the countryâ€™s â€œfirst homeschool shooter.â€ I wonder why this @nbcsnl writer deleted her tweet about Baron Trump? pic.twitter.com/y9KJKPFdeN 
â€” Fash (@gopfashionista) January 20, 2017 
According to Fox News , NBC has yet to comment on Richâ€™s tweet. She has reportedly deleted her account. 
Barron Trump is not homeschooled â€” he and his mother, first lady Melania Trump, will reportedly remain in New York so he can finish his current school year. 
Republicans and Democrats alike condemned the attack on the 10-year-old. I read an article about people cyber bullying Barron Trump. He's just a kid. We can't choose our parents. Leave children out of it please. 
â€” cyd ğŸŒ (@cydhartha13) January 23, 2017 
Members of the media took issue with the comment as well. How can some people be SO cruel? I have seen mean tweets about Barron Trump..he is a KID! I block all those who are so cruel 
â€” Greta Van Susteren (@greta) January 21, 2017 That it even need be said is ridiculous, but mocking the 10-year-old child of a politician you loathe is odious, immoral, & self-defeating 
â€” Jake Tapper (@jaketapper) January 21, 2017 Unless you have something nice to say, any comment about Barron Trump will get u blocked. Kids are off limits. 
â€” Kurt Eichenwald (@kurteichenwald) January 20, 2017 Rate this story
